name: Ghusty
description:
Hey, I'm PuppyJoe! Making a video game has been a dream of mine for a long time, and I decided this was the year I would give it some honest effort. I started a project called "Videogame Sketches" where I wanted to sketch out a video game concept once a month! Hah!

With work, life, not knowing anything, and all the in between.. it took me a lot longer than a month! I was still determined to finish this before my next birthday, and here we are. 

This game is a pure concept and is a playground for me to explore and learn how to make a video game. All of my painful progress I released (still releasing) as Devlogs on my youtube channel. Here's an example:

So, now what?
.. enjoy!

I would love feedback and thoughts. I'm not certain if I'll continue finessing this concept into a full game, or if I'll move on to another sketch. I think that depends on us! Let me know what you think! 

Thanks for humoring me as I chase a life long dream that I hope is just the beginning . Now, hurry! Ghusty can't do this alone! Have a great time poofing out some candles!

MAC version coming soon!

-PuppyJoe
